query:
-- 检查所有表是否存在
SHOW TABLES;

-- 检查每个表的记录数
SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'text_blocks', COUNT(*) FROM text_blocks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'image_blocks', COUNT(*) FROM image_blocks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'number_attributes', COUNT(*) FROM number_attributes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'lottery_types', COUNT(*) FROM lottery_types
UNION ALL
SELECT 'lottery_draws', COUNT(*) FROM lottery_draws
UNION ALL
SELECT 'zodiac_cards', COUNT(*) FROM zodiac_cards;
